wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Bernard Edward Fergusson, Baron Ballantrae,  (6 May 1911 – 28 November 1980) was a British Army officer and military historian. He became the last British-born Governor-General of New Zealand.

response: * Bernard Fergusson, Baron Ballantrae, the last British-born Governor-General of New Zealand
Bernard Fergusson, Baron Ballantrae, and Sir James Fergusson, 8th Baronet, were grandsons of the 7th Earl.

response: *Brigadier Bernard Fergusson, Baron Ballantrae (1911–1980), Governor-General of New Zealand, 1962–1967
